metadata.name: Accidental Tribute to Magritte
metadata.description:
Edition: 1/1  
Artist. Céline Pannetier  
Dimensions: 4000x2667  
Location: Barcelona  
Year: 2019  
Camera: Fujifilm X100S

I’m often wandering the busy streets of the Gothic District of Barcelona. 
The Mediterranean sun and the strong shadows are in dialogue with one another, writing ephemeral haikus. 
The project Quantum is about light’s infinite power to alter what we call reality. 

Accidental Tribute to Magritte was finalist of the 2019 LensCulture Street Photography Awards and published on this occasion in The Guardian's article: “I search for chaos”: Street Photography new stars-in picture.
